job_title: Senior Java Full Stack with Devops and Cloud Technology

job_details.degree_required: Degree in Computer Science, Statistics or relevant field

jd: From: bala, Millennium Infotech bala@mitiweb.com Reply to: bala@mitiweb.com Hi Professional,We are looking for Java Full Stack with Front End and Back End technologies.This is an Onsite role.Must have 10+ Years of experience. Minimum Requirements:Candidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements (skills/experience) will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunity.YearsRequired/PreferredExperience10RequiredProven experience as a Full Stack Developer4RequiredCloud experience STRONGLY preferred.4RequiredProven front-end development experience STRONGLY preferred using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and React JS.4RequiredProven back-end development experience using Java STRONGLY preferred.4PreferredProven database development experience STRONGLY preferred using one or more relational databases such as Oracle, SQL Server, My SQL, Snowflake or similar.3PreferredDev Ops experience.2PreferredProven cloud web application development experience STRONGLY preferred, using AWS technologies such as AWS Amplify, AWS Lambda, Amazon API Gateway1PreferredExcellent communication and teamwork skills1PreferredDegree in Computer Science, Statistics or relevant field.
